name: Doctor
description: A skilled physician, married to Mom and father of Child. Essential for keeping the crew healthy.

name: Mom
description: Married to the Doctor, mother of the Child. Her presence keeps morale high among the crew.

name: Child
description: Son of the Doctor and Mom. Innocent, but his fate deeply affects morale.

name: Rower1
description: One of two rowing brothers. Strong and loyal, but deeply tied to Rower2 and in love with PrettyWoman.

name: Rower2
description: Younger of the two brothers. Shares a bond with Rower1, and also in love with PrettyWoman.

name: Rich
description: A cunning rich passenger who often schemes to bribe others to mutiny.

name: Dog
description: The loyal ship’s dog. Beloved by the crew but vulnerable, his death can trigger disease or despair.

name: Cook
description: Keeps the crew fed and spirits lifted. Without him, morale and strength falter.

name: Poet
description: A dreamer and storyteller who boosts morale. Will step into the cook’s role if needed.

name: First Mate
description: Second-in-command of the ship. His death threatens discipline and order.

name: Priest
description: Spiritual guide of the crew. His presence prevents mutiny, but his death can destabilize faith.

name: Jack
description: A rough sailor with a septic eye. His survival depends on the Doctor’s care.

name: Pretty Woman
description: Young and beautiful. Both Rower brothers are in love with her, which makes her fate volatile.

name: Stowaway
description: A hidden passenger who boarded illegally. Often overlooked but can shift outcomes.
